room1.intro: You are in a room with a fireplace with a roaring fire and a old oak table. It is otherwise empty.

key123.description: You see a key on the oak table.
key123.name: key

room2.intro: You are in a corridor with a door to the east

south.description: South, back the way you came.

room3.intro: This stone bricked room is empty.

west.description: West, back the way you came.
